name: razor-fang
effect:
Held: When the holder attacks with most damaging moves, provides an extra 11.7% (30/256) chance for the target to flinch.
Held by Gligar: Evolves the holder into Gliscor when it levels up.
short_effect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Held by a Gligar while levelling up: Holder evolves into Gliscor.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may cause the foe to flinch when
the holder inflicts damage.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may cause the foe to flinch when
the holder inflicts damage.

fling_effect: Target will flinch if it has not yet gone this turn.
